title: What Does the 💛 Yellow Heart Emoji Mean?

steps.title: Affection and friendship.
steps.content: Affection and friendship. The 💛 emoji is pretty platonic compared to the other hearts of the emoji lexicon. If emojis could talk, the 💛 would say something like “You mean a lot to me,” “I love you like a parent/sibling,” or “I’m so glad to have you in my life.” [1] X Research source If your crush texts you a 💛, there’s a good chance they just see you as a friend.

steps.title: Positivity, warmth, and happiness.
steps.content: Positivity, warmth, and happiness. The sunny color of this emoji gives off plenty of warm and fuzzy vibes, and is a good way to share your great mood with the people in your life. [2] X Research source Some people even use this emoji to represent literal warmth, like a selfie taken on the beach or in the bright sunlight.

steps.title: Send some extra love to a friend or relative.
steps.content: Send some extra love to a friend or relative. The 💛 emoji doesn’t have any romantic strings attached, which makes it a great go-to emoji when you’re chatting with friends and relatives. Shoot over a random text to let them know that you care, or congratulate them on some exciting news with an abundance of sunny hearts. [3] X Research source “Friendly reminder that I love and care about you lots! 💛” “Literally don’t know what I’d do without you in my life 💛” “OMG congratulations!!! So happy for you 💛💛💛”

steps.title: Share some positivity with the world.
steps.content: Share some positivity with the world. The 💛 emoji is perfect for those days where you just wake up on the right side of the bed. Send a random compliment to a friend, gush about how beautiful the weather is, or just share how thankful you are to be alive. “Can’t wait to go for a walk on this gorgeous day! 💛☀️” “I know today’s gonna be a great day. 💛” “Just wanted to let know that you have a beautiful smile. Have a wonderful day, Julie! 💛🥰”

steps.title: You’re ultimate Snapchat besties.
steps.content: You’re ultimate Snapchat besties. Out of all the people on your Snapchat friend list, you send this person the most messages, pics, and videos. Guess what—according to the 💛, they’re sending you the most texts, photos, and vids, too! Basically, the two of you are friendship goals. [4] X Research source For a quick crash course on other Snapchat emoji meanings, check out this wikiHow article.
